description: Obscuria Collection - a series of major mods united by a common setting and game mechanics, as well as small technical/cosmetic mods and utilities.{#}{#}The main purpose of the Collection is to add many hours of gameplay that will provide you with an unprecedented and completely unique gaming experience.{#}{#}At the moment, a lot of mods are in development.
discord: Join our growing community to stay up to date with the latest news, vote on mod content or get help!
github: Want to help translate mods to your native language? Most of them are open source on GitHub.
patreon: If you like my work, you can support me on Patreon. High tiers have exclusive content!
